Although CHI wound up not occuring this year, the work was still published and some of the panels occured virtually. Here are some highlights on transparent research:

**Transparency of CHI Research Artifacts: Results of a Self-Reported Survey**
Chatchavan Wacharamanotham, Lukas Eisenring, Steve Haroz, Florian Echtler
[PDF](https://osf.io/3bu6t/) [DOI: 10.1145/3313831.3376448](https://doi.org/10.1145/3313831.3376448)
